item.title: Lessons Learned Webinar
item.description: On June 7, 2012, 2-3pm Eastern Time, I’ll be speaking as part of the free webinar “Lessons Learned: Roadblocks and Opportunities for Open Source Software (OSS) in U.S. Government” hosted by GovLoop. The webinar will feature a recent Department of Homeland Security (DHS) Homeland Open Security Technology (HOST) report that I co-authored, which discusses key roadblocks and opportunities in the government application of open source software, as reported in interviews of experts, suppliers, and potential users. Join us!
